member.name: T:dasspiel.GameLogic.MManager
member.summary: Contains data relating to mouse status that can be shared between application threads. Processes mouse events passed by the graphics module.

member.name: M:dasspiel.GameLogic.UIElement.SetVertecies(Microsoft.DirectX.Vector4[],System.Int32[])
member.summary: Populates the UIElement's vFrame variable with vertex data.
member.param: An array of Vertex4 elements to be used in a triangle. Count must be a multiple of 3.
An integer representation of the desired color for the vertex of matching index. Using .ToArgb() useful.
